statements: SELECT * FROM event_budget;
SELECT id, event_name FROM event_budget ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, entertainment_cost FROM event_budget WHERE catering_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM event_budget WHERE decor_cost < 500 AND entertainment_cost BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
SELECT event_name, catering_cost + decor_cost + entertainment_cost AS total_cost FROM event_budget;
SELECT * FROM event_budget WHERE catering_cost > 1000 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, SUM(catering_cost + decor_cost + entertainment_cost) AS total_cost FROM event_budget GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT event_name, event_date, catering_cost + decor_cost + entertainment_cost AS total_cost FROM event_budget WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT event_name, catering_cost, decor_cost, entertainment_cost, (catering_cost + decor_cost + entertainment_cost) AS total_cost FROM event_budget WHERE total_cost < 3000;
SELECT AVG(catering_cost) AS avg_catering_cost, AVG(decor_cost) AS avg_decor_cost, AVG(entertainment_cost) AS avg_entertainment_cost FROM event_budget;
SELECT * FROM event_expenses;
SELECT item_name, estimated_cost FROM event_expenses ORDER BY estimated_cost DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT item_category FROM event_expenses;
SELECT id, item_category, actual_cost FROM event_expenses WHERE item_category = 'Food';
SELECT budget_name, total_budget, remaining_budget FROM event_budget;
SELECT * FROM event_expenses WHERE actual_cost > estimated_cost
SELECT item_category, SUM(estimated_cost) AS total_estimated_cost FROM event_expenses GROUP BY item_category
SELECT * FROM event_budget ORDER BY remaining_budget DESC
SELECT budget_name, remaining_budget FROM event_budget WHERE total_budget > remaining_budget ORDER BY remaining_budget ASC
SELECT item_name, item_category, actual_cost FROM event_expenses WHERE item_category = 'Food'
SELECT * FROM EventBudgeting;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventBudgeting WHERE total_budget > 5000;
SELECT event_name, catering_provider, catering_cost FROM EventBudgeting JOIN CateringExpenses ON EventBudgeting.event_id = CateringExpenses.event_id;
SELECT decor_item, decor_cost FROM DecorExpenses WHERE decor_cost < 1000 ORDER BY decor_cost DESC;
SELECT event_name, total_budget FROM EventBudgeting WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_id, event_name, total_budget FROM EventBudgeting WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CateringExpenses ORDER BY catering_cost DESC;
SELECT event_name, catering_provider, catering_cost FROM EventBudgeting JOIN CateringExpenses ON EventBudgeting.event_id = CateringExpenses.event_id;
SELECT e.event_name, COUNT(de.event_id) AS num_decor_items FROM EventBudgeting e LEFT JOIN DecorExpenses de ON e.event_id = de.event_id GROUP BY e.event_name;
SELECT AVG(catering_cost) AS avg_catering_cost, MAX(decor_cost) AS max_decor_cost FROM CateringExpenses CROSS JOIN DecorExpenses;
SELECT * FROM catering;
SELECT item_name, cost FROM decor WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT event_name FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT id, item_name FROM entertainment WHERE id = 3;
SELECT event_name, total_budget FROM events WHERE total_budget < 5000;
SELECT * FROM catering WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, cost FROM decor WHERE event_id = 101 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT event_name, total_budget FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND total_budget < 5000;
SELECT catering.item_name, decor.item_name, entertainment.item_name FROM catering JOIN decor ON catering.event_id = decor.event_id JOIN entertainment ON catering.event_id = entertainment.event_id;
SELECT event_name, total_budget FROM events WHERE total_budget BETWEEN 3000 AND 5000 ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM catering;
SELECT item_name, cost FROM decor WHERE color='blue';
SELECT artist_name, performance_date FROM entertainment ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, budget FROM event WHERE event_date < '2022-06-15';
SELECT item_type, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM expenses GROUP BY item_type;
SELECT * FROM catering WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, cost FROM decor WHERE color = 'blue' ORDER BY cost
SELECT artist_name, performance_date FROM entertainment WHERE performance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY performance_date ASC
SELECT event_name, event_date, budget FROM event WHERE budget < 5000 ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT item_type, cost FROM expenses WHERE cost BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY cost
